channel.title: CVE Feed for Delite Studio -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Delite Studio -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-20846|2024-08-03T17:53:22.680Z -- delite%20studio -- push%20notifications%20for%20wordpress%20%28lite%29
item.description: Cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Push Notifications for WordPress (Lite) versions prior to 6.0.1 allows a remote attacker to hijack the authentication of an administrator and conduct an arbitrary operation via a specially crafted web page.
